titleStmt.title: The Committee of the Militia London, and the liberties thereof, earnestly desire you to enquire what armes are in your ward, ...
titleStmt.author: City of London (England). Committee for the Militia.

notesStmt.note: Title from opening lines of text.
"Dated at Guild-Hall the Twentyeth of May, 1648. Signed in the name, and by the Warrant of the Committee of the Militia London, [blank], Clerk to the said committee."
Annotations on Thomason copy: "By Adam Bankes"; "farmingdon within"; [on verso, most likely not by Thomason] "To mr. George Thomason comon Counsell-man".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
